transcript:
if you want to find a good partner
here's what you should look for someone
who is good for your mental health sure
attraction and all of that matters but
you need someone who's not going to
manipulate you someone who doesn't twist
your words and Gaslight you someone who
listens to you and makes you feel
understood but mostly someone who's not
going to try to change you but loves you
and accepts you for who you truly are
because they are a mirror for yourself
and they help you grow more in love with
yourself because you can see exactly how
much they love you
